body.p: The Content Author can share created tasks with Reviewers by retrieving the link to the task and sending the link to the Reviewers. There are several methods that can be used to retrieve the task link.

section.title: Retrieving the Task Link Using the Content Fusion Task Manager

ol.li: In the Content Fusion Tasks Manager view, right-click the particular task that you want to share and select Copy task link.
Open your email or whatever electronic messaging system your organization uses, paste the copied link, and send it to Reviewers that you want to look at the documents.

section.title: Retrieving the Task Link Using Your Browser

ol.li: Open the task in a browser (click on the name of the task in the Content Fusion Tasks Manager view).

li.p: In the task Details tab, click the SHARE button.
Step Result: This opens the Sharing settings dialog box where you can retrieve the shareable link, decide who has access to the task, and add collaborators.

ol.li: Click the Copy button to the right of the shareable link at the top of the dialog box.
Open your email or whatever electronic messaging system your organization uses, paste the copied link, and send it to Reviewers that you want to look at the documents.

p.note: For more information about the other options in the Sharing settings dialog box, see Task Details Page: Share Button.
